languages.text: {n}Арджента застывает словно каменное изваяние — а затем начинает поднимать оружие.{/n} "Наваждение... ведьмовское наваждение! Происки варпа!"
{n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента застывает словно каменное изваяние — а затем начинает поднимать оружие.{/n} "Наваждение... ведьмовское наваждение! Происки варпа!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta freezes, as unmoving a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"
{n}Argenta freezes, as unmoving a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"
{n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"
{n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"
{n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔仿佛雕像一样愣在了原地，随后慢慢地举起了武器。{/n}“那是幽灵……是巫术召唤出来的幽灵！这是亚空间的诡计！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔仿佛雕像一样愣在了原地，随后慢慢地举起了武器。{/n}“那是幽灵……是巫术召唤出来的幽灵！这是亚空间的诡计！”

languages.text: {n}Argenta se queda quieta como una estatua y luego levanta lentamente su arma.{/n} «Una aparición... ¡es obra de brujería! ¡Una trampa de la disformidad!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se queda quieta como una estatua y luego levanta lentamente su arma.{/n} «Una aparición... ¡es obra de brujería! ¡Una trampa de la disformidad!».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは一瞬、彫像のように立ち尽くす。その後、ゆっくりと武器を振り上げた。{/n}「怪異…魔術の怪異！<歪み>の策略め！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは彫像のように動かず、その後、ゆっくりと武器を振り上げた。{/n}「怪異…魔術の怪異！<歪み>の策略！」
{n}アルジェンタは一瞬、彫像のように立ち尽くす。その後、ゆっくりと武器を振り上げた。{/n}「怪異…魔術の怪異！<歪み>の策略め！」

languages.text: {n}Argenta se fige comme une statue, puis lève lentement son arme.{/n} « Une apparition... Une apparition maléfique ! Une ruse du Warp ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se fige comme une statue, puis lève lentement son arme.{/n} « Une apparition... Une apparition maléfique ! Une ruse du Warp ! »

languages.text: {n}Argenta erstarrt wie eine Statue und erhebt dann langsam ihre Waffe.{/n} "Eine Erscheinung ... eine verhexte Erscheinung! Eine Illusion des Warp!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta erstarrt wie eine Statue und erhebt dann langsam ihre Waffe.{/n} "Eine Erscheinung ... eine verhexte Erscheinung! Eine Illusion des Warp!"

languages.text: {n}Argenta, heykel gibi kaskatı kesiliyor, ardından yavaşça silahını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bir şey... Sahirlikten doğmuş bir heyula! Öteboyutun hilesi!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, heykel gibi kaskatı kesiliyor, ardından yavaşça silahını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bir şey... Sihirden doğmuş bir heyula! Öteboyutun hilesi!"

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta goes as still as a statue, then slowly raises her weapon.{/n} "An apparition... A sorcerous apparition! Trickery of the warp!"
